article:
I'm Betty. I'm from London and I'm _ . I'm 13 years old. I'm in Class 5 Grade 7.
The girl _ Zhang Lin. She is Chinese. She is from Wenzhou, a beautiful _ in Zhejiang. She is _ years old too. She _ in Class 5. She is in Class 6. We  are _ . I like China and I like Chinese food. My favourite _ is red, but Zhang Lin likes white.
The boy is Tony Smith. He is my friend too. He is from America. Tony is his first name and Smith is his _ name. He is in Class 5 too. We often play basketball _ Saturday. Ms Li is our English teacher. _ is a nice teacher. We like her very much.
